full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BLA MA LA BRTEN PA'I RIL BSGRUB BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GI RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES DMIGS BRTZE MA LA BRTEN PA'I RIM BSGRUB BSAM 'PHEL DBANG GIS RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI APA KA TA CHIN WANG SHOG GI AU RAN HAN GYI DAD LDAN HA THUN TSE 'PHEL SKYED DANG, BI LIG THU DAR HAN THO YON BLO BZANG DPAL 'BAR DANG, AERTE NI TA'I CHING KUN DGA' DON YOD, AERTE NI GU SHR'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BSTAN SKYONG RNAMS KYIS GOS DANG MAndAL BCAS PHUL NAS YANG YANG BSKUL TSE, ,SNGA SOR 'DI 'DRA'I DPE PHYOGS 'DIR MI 'DUG NA'ANG, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI MA nI RIL BSGRUB LA DPE BLANG STE, TSIG BSGYUR DGOS PA RNAMS BSGYUR TE, BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I NYI MAS MTSO BDUN @014B GYI DGON PAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GSOL DPON DGE TSUL BLO BZANG STOBS LDAN GYIS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA SPYI DANG KHYAD PAR RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE PHYOGS BCUR RGYAS PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
